ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL JAMES GARDINER of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a part-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 3, 2019.
